imageapi

Class Gradient

  • java.lang.Object
    • imageapi.ImageOperation
      • imageapi.Gradient

  • public class Gradient
extends ImageOperation
    The Gradient class contains methods for gradient analysis and getting an image representation of this.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int[][] GRID_3
      Grid size used in two-dimensional gradient analysis.

      Vector size used in one-dimensional gradient analysis.

      static float[][] minimize256(int[][] data)
      Normalize values with respect to the highest single-channel value (255).
      static float[][] minimizeByExtremes(int[][] data)
      Find the global maximum and minimum value of a single component image and normalize with regards to that value.

        public static float[][] minimizeByExtremes(int[][] data)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        zero-to-one-normalized values

      • minimize256

        public static float[][] minimize256(int[][] data)
        Normalize values with respect to the highest single-channel value (255).

        If an image has a narrow luminance spectrum

        Parameters:
        data - integer pixel data (single channel)
        Returns:
        zero-to-one-normalized matrix
